section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in No. 73-5768, Francisco against Gathright.

And for reasons stated in an opinion of the Court filed this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit is reversed and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the opinion the Court filed today.
